Hi, I found a strange issue using the same ItemsSource to two different DataGrids
 
Lets say, Page_A has a DataGrid with CanUserAddRow setted to True (default)
Page_B has a DataGrid with CanUserAddRow setted to False
 
Both DataGrid uses the same ItemsSource, an ObservableCollection.
 
When loading page A, the datagrid allows to add row.
Then, changing to page B, the datagrid does not allow to add row, as desired.
But, when chaging again to page A, the datagrid doesn't allow to add rows anymore...
 
I had to set different ItemsSource to each grid to avoid this issue...
 
Any suggestion?
